document_data.caption: A map showing Borah in central Halruaa.
document_data.name: Borah
document_data.mainbody: '''Borah''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Borah was located in central Haluraa along the edge of the [[Akhlaur Swamp]]. The town lay along the northern fringes of the swamp just south of the [[River Halar]] and northwest of [[Lake Halruaa]].
